name: AstroidEarth
description:
You're a space soldier, Earth is about to be invaded by a group of aliens

Stop the aliens from going down to earth....

Movement and resource management are key to stop them....hold the line until reinforcement arrives!!!!

*Controls

G to throw rocket

G to detonate rocket

Space to jump(toggle for jet-back boosting)

land to charge boost

Shift to sprint and fast movement

left-click to attract asteroid

right click to push asteroid 

*hint: line up asteroid trajectory to eliminate more enemies
